0.1.name: wordpress/wp-33-default-to-browser-uploader
0.1.description:
This is a very simple plugin. When this plugin is active, users will see the browser uploader by default when opening the WP Media Uploader. They can still switch back and forth as usual, but they'll see the browser uploader first. Deactivating returns the Media Uploader to its normal behavior.

For more details see http://bostinno.com/all-series/defaulting-the-wordpress-media-uploader-to-the-browser-uploader-in-wp-3-3-2/
